bitfield.description: Command for power control of the HDMI PLL Control module

bitenum.description: Command to change to OFF state (PLL_PWR_CMD_OFF signal)
Command to change to ON state for PLL (DCOCLK is power down) (PLL_PWR_CMD_ON_HS_CLK signal)
Command to change to ON state for PLL (no DCOCLKLDO/CLKDCOLDO clock output to the HDMI-PHY) (PLL_PWR_CMD_ON_DIV signal)
Command to change to ON state for PLL (PLL_PWR_CMD_ON_ALL signal)

bitfield.description: Status of the power control of the HDMI PLL Control module

bitenum.description: HDMI PLL Control module in OFF state
HDMI PLL Control module in ON state for PLL
HDMI PLL Control module in ON state for PLL (no clock output to the HDMI-PHY)
HDMI PLL Control module in ON state for PLL

bitfield.description: Defines the divisor value to be used for the generation of the SCP_PWR clock (up to 66.5MHz) from the input interface clock (up to 266MHz). 0x0 means gated 0x1 means free-running The valid values are from 0 to 7. In case of interface access to register through SCP interface, if the SCP_PWR clock is gated, the HW automatically generates the clock by using a divisor of 7 and updates the bit-field with the value 7. It is then software responsibility to change the value at any time in order to improve SCP latency when accessing the registers in the HDMI_PHY and PLLCTRL_HDMI by reducing the value.
